page.title: 17SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: THERE ARE A LARGE NUMBER OF DIFFERENT AGENCIES WHICH HELP IN MANY DIFFERENT WAYS TO MEET THE NEEDS OF THE SENIOR CITIZENS. THEY ARE LISTED BELOW WITH AN ACCOUNT OF WHAT THEY PROVIDE. {AGE CONCERN,WALTHAM FOREST {CHINGDALE CENTRE {19 CHINGDALE ROAD,E 4 (tel.524 8337) APART FROM DROP-IN FACILITIES ACTIVITIES INCLUDE CASEWORK ADVICE,DEVELOPMENT WORK WITH OTHER ORGANISATIONS,INFORMATION DISSEMINATION etc. THEY HAVE A MINI-BUS FOR HIRE AND A CHARITY SHOP AT{5 STATION PARADE,HOE ST. {TRURO ROAD DROP IN PROVIDE LIGHT LUNCHES, INFORMAL ACTIVITIES IN P.M. AND A WEEKLY ADVICE SESSION. {ST JAMES LUNCH CLUB {COMMUNITY CENTRE {FREDERICK STREET E 17 cont.
